law.catch_line: Process may issue and bonds may be taken on holidays.
law.text: It shall be no objection to any process, writ, summons, affidavit or order for a provisional remedy that it was issued, made or dated on a holiday; nor shall it be an objection to any bond given by or for any party to an action, or taken by an officer in the course of the same, that it was made or dated on any such day.
law.history: Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 664.
